profile:
Chris Banfield spent several years in the customer service industry before moving to his true passion of home inspection. He has received education in Civil Engineering Technology with a specific focus on architectural construction, along with comprehensive training specific to home inspection. He is a member of the International Association of Certified Home Inspectors (InterNACHI).

Chris says he knows there are many considerations when purchasing a home, so the buyer needs to have as much information as possible, explained in a simple, logical and professional manner. Chris provides his clients with knowledgeable and honest feedback to help them make an informed decision. He offers a clear perspective to clarify any confusing issues that relate to the home.

Canadian Residential Inspection Services raises the bar in the home inspection industry when it comes to professionalism, code of ethics and conduct. All our inspectors receive intensive training and on-going support to ensure you receive a thorough, unbiased, professional inspection. Canadian Residential Inspection Services has the most user-friendly, comprehensive reporting system in the industry.
